news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: BluSmart Mobility, an EV ride-hailing and charging infrastructure operator, secured $24 million in equity and aims to raise an additional $25 million in a Pre-Series B round. The company's growth highlights its role in sustainable mobility, with a fleet of 6000 cabs and 4000 chargers.

overview_description.description: BluSmart Mobility is a provider of electric shared smart mobility platforms for efficient, intelligent, and sustainable transportation. The company's mission is to help transform Indian cities by building a holistic and comprehensive electric on-demand mobility platform.

about_short_description.short_description: BluSmart Mobility is a ride-hailing startup that provides an electric-shared smart mobility platform for sustainable transportation.

product.name: City Rides
product.description: Seamless point-to-point pickups, making urban travel smart, efficient, and eco-friendly.

product.name: Rentals
product.description: Get limited time or all-day rentals for senior management and key executives with packages starting from 1hr/10km.

product.name: Airport Rides
product.description: Travel to and from the airport with dedicated pickup zones and shortened wait times.

product.name: Blu For Business
product.description: Efficient, eco-friendly mobility solutions tailored to businesses, including flexible rental packages and centralized management.

product.name: Assure by BluSmart
product.description: Invest in a sustainable future by buying and leasing electric cars to BluSmart, earning fixed income with tax benefits.

product.name: RideSafe with BluSmart
product.description: Ensures safe rides with screened and trained driver-partners, and 24/7 support.
